title: Heart of the Canadian Rockies
inclusions_evidence: 9 nights accommodation in Cosmos' hand-selected accommodations
Transport by air-conditioned motorcoach with free Wi-Fi
Entrance fee to Banff National Park and Jasper National Park
Tickets for the Icefields Explorer Experience at Columbia Icefields

hotel.name_or_hint: Various accommodations in Calgary, Banff, Jasper, Kamloops, Victoria, Vancouver

items.label: Entrance fee to Banff National Park
Entrance fee to Jasper National Park

other.notes: Additional costs for activities and transportation not included in the package.

reasoning: This deal offers significant savings compared to DIY options, especially considering the included guided tours and experiences that would be costly to arrange independently.
